entry.title: How to update favicon in Chirpy Jekyll Theme

link.title: How to update favicon in Chirpy Jekyll Theme

entry.summary: Update the .png,.jpg image Resize your image to a square shape that is change the size to 512x512 or more. Convert the Resized image to icon Use the Favicon Converter to get the .zip file. Extract the images Update the images in Favicon folder Copy the extracted images and paste it in assets/img/favicons folder. Use this page for reference

entry.title: VIM Basics
entry.summary: Hi just an intro to VIM (Terminal Editor Application) Basics that I know Open Vim in Terminal vim or vim {filename} How to save and Quit :wq Indentation For Properly Indenting code use (place curser on line that needs to indented) = = Visually Select and indent using = = To indent the line to the right press &gt; To indent the line to the left press &lt; Multi-inserting same tex...

entry.title: Riscv Programming Basics
entry.summary: Having to study microprocessor architecture and organization, the open source and modular aspect of RISC-V interested me much. Risc-V is a Open Source ISA which anyone can use and modify. First we have to setup the riscv-toolchain RISC-V Toolchain Setup ====================== This is the RISC-V C and C++ cross-compiler. It supports two build modes: a generic ELF/Newlib toolchain and a more s...
